graph_title: Proportion of individuals using the Internet by sex and age groups
indicator_name: Proportion of individuals using the Internet by sex and age groups
national_indicator_description: Dividing the number of people using the Internet during the last 3 months by the total number of people.
computation_calculations: The indicator is calculated by dividing the number of people using the Internet (from anywhere) during the last 3 months by the total number of people.
comments_limitations: The main source of information is a Integrated Living Conditions Survey (ILCS) (https://www.armstat.am/en/?nid=82&id=2217)
source_organisation_2: Integrated Living Conditions Survey of households (ILCS)
